title: Twisted Fate E Stacked Deck
body: Just played TF and apparently after 3 auto attacks there is no sound effect when E goes up.

replies.body:
Hey Rùstý - 

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating! ^-^
Hi! Seems like there is still no sound effect. I don't know if you removed it intentionally because i noticed you changed the counter a patch ago but i miss so much that laugh every 4 attacks :'(

Hey! 

So, I actually looked into this again yesterday - they're working on it - looks like the audio hookup fell off. Haven't forgotten about this!
